amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part A of House Report 119-255 to ban the research, development, procurement and promotion of cell cultured meat by the DOD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 236, 1 Present (Roll no. 254).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 236, 1 Present (Roll no. 254).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
